2. ASUS ROG Swift PG329Q

This 32-inch FHD gaming monitor boasts a 32:9 aspect ratio and 144Hz refresh rate, ensuring smooth, tear-free gameplay. The ASUS ROG Swift PG329Q also features NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility, AMD FreeSync, and HDR for stunning visuals and immersive gaming experiences. The Fast IPS technology and advanced cooling system provide a stable and smooth gaming experience, while the stylish design and customizable lighting options add to the overall appeal.

3. AOC C32G1 32" Curved Gaming Monitor

This 32-inch curved gaming monitor offers a 165Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and AMD FreeSync for tear-free gameplay. Its frameless design, low input lag mode, and game-specific presets make it an ideal choice for immersive and competitive gaming. The AOC C32G1 also features a 95% DCI-P3 color gamut for vibrant and accurate colors, as well as USB-C and HDMI connectivity for easy setup and connection.

4. ViewSonic TD2455 24" Full HD In-Cell Touch Monitor

This 24-inch Full HD in-cell touch monitor features a sleek and modern design, making it perfect for offices, classrooms, and presentation hubs. The ViewSonic TD2455 offers 10-point PCAP touch, DisplayPort MST, USB-C, and an ergonomic stand, ensuring a comfortable and efficient user experience. The monitor also boasts a 5000000:1 dynamic contrast ratio and 90% NTSC color gamut for vibrant and accurate visuals.
